short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ensure your safety by verifying if products are flagged as dangerous in the EU RAPEX database for alerts and product recalls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
SafeCart extension helps you ensure the safety of the products you buy online. By leveraging the RAPEX (EU Safety Gate) database, this tool lets you check if a product is flagged as dangerous or has been recalled due to safety risks.

Features
Barcode Verification: Enter a product barcode to see if it matches any dangerous items in the RAPEX database.
Product Name Search: Check for product safety by its name.

Why Use Dangerous Product Checker?
Ensure the safety of your loved ones by avoiding unsafe or recalled products. Whether youâ€™re shopping online or verifying products at home, this extension keeps you informed and protected.

How It Works
Click on the extension icon in your browser toolbar.
Enter a product name or barcode into the search field.
Instantly view detailed information about the product, including its safety status.

Privacy
This extension does not collect or store any personal information. All checks are performed directly against the RAPEX database.
